news.title: Starmer confirms talks with Labour rebels over welfare cuts concessions
news.summary: The prime minister said talks would continue in the "coming days" with Labour MPs who oppose the plans.

news.title: My wife and daughters left behind a legacy of love, John Hunt tells BBC
news.summary: The racing commentator, speaking for the first time since the murder of his wife and two daughters, says their love has helped sustain him through grief.

news.title: 'They were the best of us': John and Amy Hunt speak for first time about murders of their loved ones
news.summary: BBC racing commentator John Hunt has spoken for the first time since the murder of his wife and two daughters, in July last year.

news.title: Amber heat health alerts issued as temperatures to soar
news.summary: The alerts warn of increased pressure on health and social care services as temperatures climb.

news.title: What might James Bond be like under new director Denis Villeneuve?
news.summary: The Oscar-nominated Dune film-maker says he is a "die-hard" Bond fan and will "honour" the franchise.

news.title: One child in every classroom is IVF baby, new research suggests
news.summary: Around one in 32 UK births in 2023 was as a result of IVF, a new report has shown.

news.title: Three Palestinians killed during Israeli settler attack on West Bank village
news.summary: Israel's military says its forces returned fire after being shot at by Palestinians, but the Palestinian foreign ministry blames settlers for the deaths.

news.title: Pornhub to introduce 'government approved' age checks in UK
news.summary: It is one of a number of porn sites which regulator Ofcom says will bring in tougher age verification for users.

news.title: Reform UK council boss quits, leaving 18-year-old in charge
news.summary: Rob Howard leaves his position as leader of Warwickshire County Council, citing health concerns.

news.title: 'I don't want to live on benefits, I want to work'
news.summary: Young disabled people may soon see their Universal Credit top-up cut as part of wider welfare reforms.
